re-entry.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when someone starts being involved in something again or enters a place again
re-entry.translation[0].definitions[0].e: America’s successful re-entry into the Japanese auto market
re-entry.translation[0].definitions[1].d: when a spacecraft enters the Earth’s atmosphere again
re-entry.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The satellite burned up on re-entry.
